matflash.label: instrux
matflash.flashtext: Study the terms and definitions from your text.

matflash.label: popup
matflash.flashtext: Flashcards are intended for self-study. Your work will not be saved once you close your browser window.

You can view the Flashcards in three different ways by selecting one of the options in the View drop down menu located at the bottom left of the screen. Your three options are: term first, definition first, or term and definition at the same time. You also have the ability to see all cards, or just the ones you deem unlearned. The Jump To drop down menu located at the bottom right of the screen allows you to jump to a specific term. While viewing your cards, you have the ability to Flip your current view of the card by clicking on Flip located at the top right hand corner of the card. Also, check of the Card Learned box at the top right hand corner of the card to indicate the card is learned. Once a card is marked learned it will not show up again for review.
Use the buttons at the top right hand of the flashcards screen to navigate between cards in a pack.
Clicking on Reset Pack will purge your learned cards and assemble the pack from scratch.
Clicking on Shuffle Pack will shuffle the cards in the pack in a random order.
